edu.lognet.core.protocols.p2p.chord
Class AbstractChord

java.lang.Object
  edu.lognet.core.protocols.p2p.chord.AbstractChord
All Implemented Interfaces:
IChord, IDHT, IRequestHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSynapse, ChordNode, ChordNode
public abstract class AbstractChord
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChord

This abstract class represent a node in the jChord protocol

Author:
laurent.vanni@sophia.inria.fr - logNet team 2010 - INRIA Sophia-Antipolis - France
